div.pre: 2354 Monaco (anc. Monoikos), 1880 (702) Burial: mid 3rd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 21 AE Neapolis: 2 Carthage: 19 Sardinian mint (as SNGCop. 144 etc. ?) Disposition: unknown BSAF 1880, p.114; 1895, p. 159 Blanchet, Trait√©, p. 181 Jenkins, NC 1957, p. 13
